net.sourceforge.zmanim.util

Class Zman

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.zmanim.util.Zman

  • public class Zman
extends Object
    Wrapper class for an astronomical time, mostly used to sort collections of astronomical times.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    © Eliyahu Hershfeld 2007-2011
